author: Staff Reporter
text:
On account of Anjaneyar Jayanthi, special pujas and abishekams were performed to the 18-foot idol of Anjaneyar in Suchindram Thanumalayaswamy temple on Saturday. Temple sources said that 16 abishekams including milk, sandal were performed on the idol.

Hundreds of devotees offered prayers. Police made security arrangements and regulated traffic around the temple. Annadhanam was inaugurated by former minister N. Thalavai Sundaram in the presence of District Revenue Officer A. Udhayakumar, Joint Commissioner of HR and CE Department Siva Ramachandran.

Special buses were operated by TNSTC to Suchindram from different destinations in the district.
title: Special pujas performed
